name: Intelligent Enterprise adoption KPI
success_measures: Drive customers to adopt 3 or more Intelligent Enterprise services (IAS, E-SAC, Integration Suite, Task Centre, Workflow, Master Data Integration)

name: Portfolio Success
success_measures: Customer Leveraging services from 2 or more Categories: (1. App Dev, 2. Digital Experience, 3. Process Automation, 4. Integration Suite, 5. Planning and Analytics, 6. Database and Data Management

name: Go-Lives
success_measures: Supporting a customer to Go-Live. Customer Use Case/Scenario to be captured in Asset Repository/Relevant tools to be updated
